languages.text: Если персонаж теряет большое количество пунктов {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, он может получить постоянные {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g} — ранения и травмы. Если здоровье персонажа в бою опустилось до 0, он окажется без сознания и получит {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}, которая дает серьезные {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g} к его параметрам в зависимости от своего типа. Если персонаж за один {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} боя теряет количество пунктов здоровья (настоящих, не временных), превышающий N% от его {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, он получает ранение. Каждое ранение снижает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажа.

Whenever a character loses a large portion of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they might suffer permanent {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} known as {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. If a character's wounds are reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} in a single combat {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
languages.original_text: Если персонаж теряет большое количество пунктов {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, он может получить постоянные {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативные эффекты{/g} — ранения и травмы. Если здоровье персонажа в бою опустилось до 0, он окажется без сознания и получит {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}, которая дает серьезные {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафы{/g} к его параметрам в зависимости от своего типа. Если персонаж за один {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} боя теряет количество пунктов здоровья (настоящих, не временных), превышающий N% от его {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, он получает ранение. Каждое ранение снижает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажа.

traits.locale_text: Whenever a character loses a large portion of their wounds, they might suffer permanent negative effects known as injuries and traumas. If a character's wounds is reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial penalties to their characteristics depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary maximum wounds in a single combat round, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's resolve.

Whenever a character loses a large portion of their wounds, they might suffer permanent negative effects known as injuries and traumas. If a character's wounds is reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial penalties to their characteristics depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary maximum wounds in a single combat round, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's resolve.

Whenever a character loses a large portion of their wounds, they might suffer permanent negative effects known as injuries and traumas. If a character's wounds are reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial penalties to their characteristics depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary maximum wounds in a single combat round, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's resolve.

Whenever a character loses a large portion of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they might suffer permanent {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} known as {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. If a character's wounds are reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} in a single combat {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

Whenever a character loses a large portion of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they might suffer permanent {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} known as {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. If a character's wounds are reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} in a single combat {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn ein Charakter einen großen Teil seiner {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verliert, kann er möglicherweise permanente {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekte{/g} erleiden, bekannt als {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g}. Fallen die Wunden eines Charakters auf 0, verliert er das Bewusstsein und erleidet ein Trauma, das erhebliche {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} anwendet, abhängig von der Art des entstandenen Traumas. Verliert ein Charakter N % seiner nicht-temporären {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} in einer einzelnen {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Kampfrunde{/g}, erleidet er eine Verletzung. Jede Verletzung verringert die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} eines Charakters.
languages.original_text: Whenever a character loses a large portion of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they might suffer permanent {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} known as {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. If a character's wounds are reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} in a single combat {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Charakter einen großen Teil seiner {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verliert, kann er möglicherweise permanente {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative Effekte{/g} erleiden, bekannt als {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g}. Fallen die Wunden eines Charakters auf 0, verliert er das Bewusstsein und erleidet ein Trauma, das erhebliche {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzüge{/g} auf seine Eigenschaften anwendet, abhängig von der Art des entstandenen Traumas. Verliert ein Charakter N % seiner nicht-temporären {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} in einer einzelnen Kampf{g|Encyclopedia:Round}runde{/g}, erleidet er eine Verletzung. Jede Verletzung verringert die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} eines Charakters.

languages.text: Lorsqu'un personnage perd une part importante de sa {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}réserve de blessures{/g}, il peut subir des {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} permanents appelés {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g}. Si la réserve de blessures d'un personnage est réduite à 0, il perd connaissance et subit un traumatisme qui applique des {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} non négligeables à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}, en fonction du type de traumatisme. Si un personnage perd N% de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} non temporaires au cours d'un même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat , il subit une lésion. Chaque lésion réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage.
languages.original_text: Whenever a character loses a large portion of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they might suffer permanent {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} known as {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. If a character's wounds are reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} in a single combat {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un personnage perd une part importante de sa {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}réserve de blessures{/g}, il peut subir des {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effets négatifs{/g} permanents appelés {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatismes{/g}. Si la réserve de blessures d'un personnage est réduite à 0, il perd connaissance et subit un traumatisme qui applique des {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalités{/g} non négligeables à ses caractéristiques, en fonction du type de traumatisme. Si un personnage perd N% de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} non temporaires au cours d'un même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat , il subit une lésion. Chaque lésion réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage.

languages.text: 当角色损失大部分{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，可能会承受各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}，如{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。 当角色的生命值降为0点时，该角色会失去意识，许多{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}都会遭受严重的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果影响，减值效果取决于承受最后一击的类型。 如果某位角色在单{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中损失了A%的非临时{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}，则该角色会承受一处伤势。 每当角色承受伤势时，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}都会降低。
languages.original_text: Whenever a character loses a large portion of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they might suffer permanent {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} known as {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. If a character's wounds are reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} in a single combat {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当角色损失大部分{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，可能会承受各种各样的{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}，如{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。 当角色的生命值降为0点时，该角色会失去意识，遭受一定的{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}效果影响，减值效果取决于承受最后一击的类型。 如果某位角色在单个{g|Encyclopedia:Round}回合{/g}中损失了A%的非临时{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}，则该角色会承受一处伤势。 每当角色获得伤势时，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}都会降低。

languages.text: Cuando un personaje pierde una gran parte de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, es posible que sufra unos {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g} permanentes llamados {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}. Si las heridas de un personaje se reducen a 0, pierde la consciencia y sufre una aflicción que aplica {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} considerables a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} en función del tipo de aflicción que acabe desarrollando. Si un personaje pierde un N % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} permanentes en un solo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} del combate, sufrirá una lesión. Cada lesión reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del personaje en cuestión.
languages.original_text: Whenever a character loses a large portion of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they might suffer permanent {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} known as {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. If a character's wounds are reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} in a single combat {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un personaje pierde una gran parte de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, es posible que sufra unos {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efectos negativos{/g} permanentes llamados {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicciones{/g}. Si las heridas de un personaje se reducen a 0, pierde la consciencia y sufre una aflicción que aplica {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalizaciones{/g} considerables a sus características en función del tipo de aflicción que acabe desarrollando. Si un personaje pierde un N % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} permanentes en un solo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} del combate, sufrirá una lesión. Cada lesión reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del personaje en cuestión.

languages.original_text: If a character loses a large number of health points, he can receive permanent negative effects — wounds and injuries. If a character's health drops to 0 in combat, he will be unconscious and injured, which gives serious penalties to his parameters depending on his type. If a character loses a number of health points (real, not temporary) in one round of combat that exceeds N% of his maximum health, he takes multiple wounds. Each wound reduces the character's resolve.

languages.text: キャラクターが大幅に{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を失った場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}と言った永続的な{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}ネガティブ効果{/g}を受ける可能性がある。 キャラクターの体力が0にまで減ると、キャラクターは意識を失い外傷を負う。外傷はそのタイプに応じて{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に多大な{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を与える。 キャラクターが1回の戦闘{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に一時体力ではない{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}をN%失うと、キャラクターは負傷を負う。 各負傷によりキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が低下する。
languages.original_text: Whenever a character loses a large portion of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they might suffer permanent {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} known as {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. If a character's wounds are reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} in a single combat {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターが大幅に{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を失った場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}のような永続的な{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}ネガティブ効果{/g}を受ける可能性がある。 キャラクターの体力が0にまで減ると、キャラクターは意識を失いトラウマが付与される。トラウマはそのタイプに応じて能力に多大な{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を与える。 キャラクターが1回の戦闘{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に一時体力ではない{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}をN%失うと、キャラクターは負傷を負う。 各負傷によりキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が低下する。

languages.text: Bir karakter {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanlarının büyük bir kısmını yitirdiğinde, {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travma{/g} olarak bilinen kalıcı {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkilere{/g} maruz kalabilir. Sağlık puanı 0'a inen karakter ise bilincini kaybeder ve {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} ciddi {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanları{/g} uygulayan bir travma geçirir. Hangi niteliklerin ne ölçüde etkileneceği, travmanın türüne bağlıdır. Karakter tek bir çatışma {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundunda{/g}, geçici olmayan {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanlarının %N kadarını kaybederse bir sakatlığa maruz kalır. Her sakatlık, karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} puanını düşürür.
languages.original_text: Whenever a character loses a large portion of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they might suffer permanent {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} known as {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}. If a character's wounds are reduced to 0, they lose consciousness and suffer a trauma that applies substantial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} depending on what kind of trauma it ends up being. If a character loses N% of their non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} in a single combat {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they suffer an injury. Each injury reduces a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
